titleStmt.title: The guard of the tree of life, or, A sacramental discourse shewing a Christians priviledge in approaching to God in ordinances, duty in his sacramentall approaches, danger if hee do not sanctifie God in them / by Samuel Bolton ...
titleStmt.author: Bolton, Samuel, 1606-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Simmons for A. Kembe, and are to be sold at his shop ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
